definitions.definition: to break the surface of the skin by rubbing against something rough:
examples: He fell down and grazed his knee.

definitions.definition: If an object grazes something, it touches its surface lightly when it passes it:
examples: The aircraft's landing gear grazed the treetops as it landed.

definitions.definition: an injury on the surface of your skin caused by rubbing it against something rough:
examples: Her legs were covered with cuts and grazes.
